original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas /
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas /
translated: Since there is no objection,

original: de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: this is understood as an agreement.

original: de'i 'og tu lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong mas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong mas /

analyzed: tshogs pa'i dus su dge 'dun las sang snga dro 'brel ba med pa'i lhung bzed 'brim gyi /
translated: should announce at the time of the assembly, “Tomorrow morning, the community will distribute the connected alms bowls.

analyzed: rang rang gi lhung bzed snoms la spyon cig / ces brjod par bya'o //

original: de nas nam nangs pa dang / 'brim par byed pa'i dge slong mas gnas mal bshams @238a *//
analyzed: de nas nam nangs pa dang / 'brim par byed pa'i dge slong mas gnas mal bshams @238a *//
translated: Then, when it is dawn, the nun who distributes the bowls should prepare the seats

original: par byas te /
analyzed: par byas te /
translated: and,

analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa thogs te /

original: dge slong ma'i gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug nas /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug nas /
translated: and sit in front of the most senior nun.

original: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'i bsngags pa ji lta ba bzhin brjod par bya zhing /🔽'di skad ces gnas brtan ma lhung bzed bzhes shig /
analyzed: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'i bsngags pa ji lta ba bzhin brjod par bya zhing / 'di skad ces gnas brtan ma lhung bzed bzhes shig /

analyzed: ces kyang brjod par bya'o // gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis /

analyzed: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed gnas brtan gnyis pa shos la sbyin par bya'o //

analyzed: gnas brtan gnyis pa shos kyi lhung bzed gsum pa shos la sbyin par bya ste /

original: de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du yang ngo //
translated: In the same way, it should be given down to the youngest member of the saṅgha.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa ma blangs la /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa ma blangs la /
translated: If the elder of the saṅgha does not take the almsbowl that is not connected,

analyzed: gnas brtan gsum pa'i thad du phyin pa las / gal te slar yang dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis slong na sbyin par mi bya'o //

analyzed: lan gnyis slong na yang sbyin par mi bya'o //

original: gal te lan gsum du slong na sbyin par bya ste /

analyzed: 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas bshags par bya'o //
translated: She should confess the offense of a wrong action that violates the rule.

original: de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du ste /
translated: The same applies up to a newly ordained nun.

original: gal te sus kyang lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa ma blangs sam; gzhan gyi lhag par gyur na de nyid la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te sus kyang lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa ma blangs sam; gzhan gyi lhag par gyur na de nyid la sbyin par bya'o //

analyzed: des de'i 'og tu kun tu spyad par bya ba brjod par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa na ma shes nas /
translated: “After that, she should recite the rules of training,” the Blessed One said.🔽When they did not know what to do,

original: bcom @238b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom @238b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong ma'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste /

analyzed: dge slong ma lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'chang ba gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro na / lag pa g-yas par lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bskur zhing /

original: lag pa g-yon par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //

original: gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na byin gyis brlabs par blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na byin gyis brlabs par blang bar bya'o //

original: gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na lhung bzed 'brel ba med par blang bar bya'o /
analyzed: gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na lhung bzed 'brel ba med par blang bar bya'o /
translated: If he finds dry rice, he should take it without consecrating it.

original: gal te lhung bzed kyi snod du 'jug par byed na /🔽zhabs su ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te lhung bzed kyi snod du 'jug par byed na / zhabs su ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: If he is going to put it in a bowl,🔽he should put the consecrated rice at the bottom.

original: steng du ni lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: steng du ni lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: He should put the dry rice on top of that.

original: gal te byi dor byed na /
analyzed: gal te byi dor byed na /
translated: If he is going to clean it,

original: dang por lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dang por lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: he should clean the dry rice first.

original: phyi nas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: Then he should consecrate it.

original: gal te lhung bzed gdu bu'i steng du 'jog na /
analyzed: gal te lhung bzed gdu bu'i steng du 'jog na /
translated: If he is going to put the bowl on a stand,

original: byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhag par bya'o //
translated: he should put the dry rice on top of the consecrated rice.

original: gal te lhung bzed kyi las byed na /
analyzed: gal te lhung bzed kyi las byed na /
translated: If he is going to cook the rice,

original: rdza bo bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bsreg par bya'o //🔽ngan par ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: rdza bo bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bsreg par bya'o //🔽ngan par ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: he should put the dry rice in the best pot and cook it without consecrating it.🔽He should put the consecrated rice in a bad pot and cook it.

original: gal te lam du 'gro na lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams la byin gyis brlabs pa bskur bar bya zhing /
analyzed: gal te lam du 'gro na lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams la byin gyis brlabs pa bskur bar bya zhing /
translated: If he is traveling on a road, he should give the consecrated bowl to his co-resident disciples or disciples in the next highest ordination.

original: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa ni rang gis so; ;gal te khyer ba 'ga' yang med na /🔽mchan khung g-yas kyis ni lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽g-yon gyis ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa ni rang gis so; ;gal te khyer ba 'ga' yang med na / mchan khung g-yas kyis ni lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'o // g-yon gyis ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: If he has no disciples,🔽he should carry the consecrated bowl in his right armpit

original: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'chang ba'i @239a *//🔽dge slong mas /
analyzed: lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'chang ba'i @239a *// dge slong mas /
translated: and the other bowl in his left armpit.

original: kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te /
analyzed: kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te /
translated: “If a monk who is keeping an extra bowl

analyzed: 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: does not act in accordance with the rule on using it, he becomes guilty of an offense.

original: dge 'dun gyis lhung bzed tha ma de byin gyis mi brlab ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis lhung bzed tha ma de byin gyis mi brlab ste /
translated: The Saṅgha should not consecrate a monk’s last bowl.

original: byin gyis brlab par mi bya /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab par mi bya /

original: su la yang sbyin par mi bya bar khad kyis dal bus dal bus ji srid 'tsho'i bar chag pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: su la yang sbyin par mi bya bar khad kyis dal bus dal bus ji srid 'tsho'i bar chag pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bcang bar bya'o //
translated: He should not give it to anyone. He should keep it until the end of his life, using it as a substitute when the other is being repaired.”

original: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does one commit a downfall in this case?

original: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang lhan pa gcig gis glan par 'os shing /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang lhan pa gcig gis glan par 'os shing /

analyzed: ma glan pa spyad pa bzod bzhin du gzhan tshol bar byed na nyes byas so //

analyzed: ma glan pa spyad bzod bzhin du gzhan yang tshol bar byed na nyes byas so //
translated: If she uses it without repairing it and then searches for another, it is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: If she obtains another, it is a downfall that requires confession alone.

original: dge slong ma lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /
analyzed: dge slong ma lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /
translated: If a nun’s begging bowl has a crack,

analyzed: lhan pa gsum glan par 'os shing / ma glan la spyad bzod bzhin du gzhan yang tshol ba byed na nyes byas so //

original: thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do //

translated: If she obtains another, it is a downfall that requires confession alone.

original: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /

translated: If a nun’s begging bowl has a crack,

original: thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do //

original: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /
translated: If a nun’s alms bowl has a crack,

original: lhan pa lngas glan par 'os shing /
analyzed: lhan pa lngas glan par 'os shing /
translated: it is suitable to repair it with five patches.

analyzed: ma glan la spyad bzod bzhin du gal te gzhan @239b yang tshol bar byed na nyes pa med do //
translated: If, having not repaired it, she uses it and also seeks another, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /
translated: If a nun’s alms bowl has a crack,

analyzed: lhan pa gcig gis glan par 'os pas glan te spyad bzod bzhin du gzhan tshol bar byed na nyes byas so //

analyzed: thob na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: If she obtains it, she commits a downfall that requires confession.

analyzed: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang / lhan pa gnyis kyis glan par 'os pas glan te spyad bzod bzhin du zhes bya ba nas /
translated: If a nun’s alms bowl has a crack,🔽it is suitable to repair it with two patches. If she repairs it and uses it, but seeks another, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: nyes byas dang / spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: nyes byas dang / spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: If she obtains it, she commits a downfall that requires confession.

analyzed: dge slong ma'i lhung bzed chag par gyur kyang /

analyzed: lhan pa lngas glan par 'os pas glan kyang rung ma glan kyang rung /
translated: it is appropriate to repair it with five patches, whether or not it has been repaired.

translated: The Setting was in Śrāvastī.

original: gang gi tshe nye dga' la brten te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nye dga' la brten te /
translated: When, in dependence on Upasena,

analyzed: nye du ma yin pa las skud pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe /
translated: the basis of the training precept about not accepting thread from those who are not relatives was laid down,

analyzed: dge slong ma sbom dga' mos / nye du ma yin pa dang / nye du las kyang skud pa bslangs shing /
translated: the bhikṣuṇī Upacālā🔽accepted thread from those who were not relatives and from relatives,

analyzed: tha ga pa nye du dang nye du ma yin pa la yang gos 'thag tu 'jug nas /
translated: and she had cloth woven by weavers who were relatives and who were not relatives.

analyzed: don nyung ba'i dge slong ma dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de /
translated: The nuns of few desires criticized her,🔽and the nuns told the monks, who in turn told the Blessed One.🔽The Blessed One said, “Is it true, monks, that the nun Utpalavarṇā did this?”🔽“It’s true, Blessed One.”🔽The Buddha, the Blessed One, rebuked her,

original: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / zhes bya ba nas /

translated: “Monks, how could the nun Utpalavarṇā do this?🔽Monks, this sort of thing should not be done.🔽Monks, it’s not suitable for the nun Utpalavarṇā to do this.🔽Monks, the nun Utpalavarṇā is shameless.

original: bslab pa bca' ba'i bar @240a *//
analyzed: bslab pa bca' ba'i bar @240a *//
translated: She has no respect for the rules of training.🔽Monks, the nun Utpalavarṇā should ask the community of nuns for probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training.🔽Monks, the nun Utpalavarṇā should ask the community of nuns for probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training.🔽This is the motion.🔽The nun Utpalavarṇā should ask the community of nuns for probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training.

original: du mdzad de /🔽yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag gam /
analyzed: du mdzad de / yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag gam /
translated: This is the ceremony.🔽The nun Utpalavarṇā has asked the community of nuns for probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training.

original: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa las skud pa bslangs te /
analyzed: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa las skud pa bslangs te /
translated: If the community of nuns agrees, the community of nuns should grant the nun Utpalavarṇā probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training.🔽This is the motion.🔽The nun Utpalavarṇā has asked the community of nuns for probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training.

original: tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: The community of nuns grants the nun Utpalavarṇā probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training.🔽Any nun who approves of granting the nun Utpalavarṇā probation for one day due to her shameless behavior and lack of respect for the rules of training should remain silent.🔽Any nun who does not approve should speak up.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi dus kyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang logs su bgo bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pas /
translated: “The Blessed One has said, ‘You should not distribute the summer-residence gifts during the summer.’🔽Since we want to train in that, we have not distributed them.”

original: bslab pa 'dod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de; dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: bslab pa 'dod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de; dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The nuns told the monks what had happened, and the monks reported it to the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas /🔽bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang zhes bya ba nas / bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de /
translated: The Blessed One then issued this instruction:

original: dge slong mas ston zla tha chung nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig rnyed la brtad pa las byung ba'i gos 'dod na /
analyzed: dge slong mas ston zla tha chung nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig rnyed la brtad pa las byung ba'i gos 'dod na /
translated: “If a nun finds a robe that has come from a place where they distribute gifts between the first day of the last month of the rainy season and the fifteenth day of that month, and if she wants a robe that has come from a place where they distribute gifts,

original: dge slong ma des blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma des blang bar bya'o //
translated: That nun should accept it.

original: blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
translated: Having accepted it, she should keep it until the time of giving the robe.

original: de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do //🔽zhag bcu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do // zhag bcu zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If she keeps it beyond that, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.🔽Ten days:

original: zhag bcu pa la dgag dbye 'byung bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhag bcu pa la dgag dbye 'byung bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: the end of the ten days is when the end of the invitation ceremony occurs.🔽A nun:

original: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go /
analyzed: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go /
translated: one who has had initiation into the monastic life.🔽A robe:

original: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so //🔽brtad pa las byung ba'i gos zhes bya ba la brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga ste /
analyzed: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so // brtad pa las byung ba'i gos zhes bya ba la brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga ste /
translated: from another.🔽A robe that comes from a distribution:

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: there are five kinds of robes that come from a distribution:

original: 'ongs pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang / nad pa dang / nad g-yog dang / dge skos ma'o //
analyzed: 'ongs pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang / nad pa dang / nad g-yog dang / dge skos ma'o //
translated: those of a visitor, those of one who is about to leave, those of a sick person, those of a nurse, and those of a nun who is a distributor.🔽A robe:

original: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po gang yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po gang yang rung ba'o //
translated: any of the seven kinds of robes.🔽If she wishes:

original: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o //🔽gos sbyin @245a *//
analyzed: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o // gos sbyin @245a *//
translated: if she is interested.

original: pa'i dus su bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i dus su bcang bar bya'o //
translated: She should keep it until the time of giving the robe.

original: zhes bya ba ni gos sbyin pa'i dus /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gos sbyin pa'i dus /
translated: The time of giving the robe:

original: zhag bcu'i dgag dbye gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhag bcu'i dgag dbye gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the lifting of restrictions that lasts ten days.

original: de las 'das par zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par ro //
analyzed: de las 'das par zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par ro //
translated: “Having passed that” means having gone beyond that.

original: spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: One commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is there an offense?

original: gang yang dge slong mas dbyar gyi rnyed pa ci yang rung dbyar gyi nang logs su 'ged pa dang / dgag dbye las 'das par 'chang na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yang dge slong mas dbyar gyi rnyed pa ci yang rung dbyar gyi nang logs su 'ged pa dang / dgag dbye las 'das par 'chang na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: If a nun distributes any of the gains from the rainy season retreat while the rainy season retreat is still in progress, or if she keeps them after the lifting of restrictions, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

original: gal te gos sbed pa'i dge slong ma bskos na ltung ba med do //
analyzed: gal te gos sbed pa'i dge slong ma bskos na ltung ba med do //
translated: If she keeps the robes of a nun who has been appointed to hide the robes, there is no offense.

original: spang ba'i ltung byed bcu bdun pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed bcu bdun pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The seventeenth training rule is finished.

original: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //
analyzed: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o //
translated: The Case of Śroṇaka in Śrāvastī.

original: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' las brten te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' las brten te /
translated: When the Buddha, on the basis of Upāli,

original: dge 'dun gyi gang zag rang gir sgyur bar byed pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gang zag rang gir sgyur bar byed pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pa de'i tshe /
translated: had laid down the rule that the Sangha should not be given to individuals,

original: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa blangs nas gang zag gir sgyur bar byed pa na /
analyzed: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa blangs nas gang zag gir sgyur bar byed pa na /
translated: The group of twelve nuns took the offerings intended for the community and made them their own.

original: don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: don nyung ba'i dge slong ma rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de /
translated: The nuns with few desires complained and criticized them.

original: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The nuns told the monks, and the monks told the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba nas bslab pa bca' ba'i bar du mdzad de /
translated: The Blessed One then issued a prohibition, and so on, down to:

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhig shes bzhin du dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhig shes bzhin du dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: “If any nun, knowingly, makes the offerings intended for the community her own, she must acknowledge it: ‘I have done a blameworthy and unsuitable thing that is to be acknowledged. ’”

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhig ces bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde rnams so //🔽shes @245b bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhig ces bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde rnams so // shes @245b bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam /
translated: “If any nun” means the group of twelve.

original: gzhan gyis smras par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras par gyur pa'o //
translated: “Knowingly” means either by herself or by what others say.

original: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
translated: “The Saṅgha” means the Saṅgha of the Tathāgata’s śrāvakas.

original: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa gnyis po gos kyi rnyed pa dang / zas kyi rnyed pa ste /
analyzed: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa gnyis po gos kyi rnyed pa dang / zas kyi rnyed pa ste /
translated: “Gain” means the two kinds of gain: gain of robes and gain of food.

original: skabs 'dir ni gos kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: skabs 'dir ni gos kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs so //
translated: In this context, it is gain of robes that is intended.

original: bsngos pa zhes bya ba ni phul ba'o //
analyzed: bsngos pa zhes bya ba ni phul ba'o //
translated: “Is dedicated” means is offered.

original: gang zag bdag gir byed na zhes bya ba ni rang gir byed na'o //
analyzed: gang zag bdag gir byed na zhes bya ba ni rang gir byed na'o //
translated: “If an individual appropriates it” means if she makes it her own.

original: spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: It is an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the offense here?

original: dge slong mas shes bzhin du gang zag la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gzhan du gang zag la sgyur bar byed na /
analyzed: dge slong mas shes bzhin du gang zag la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gzhan du gang zag la sgyur bar byed na /
translated: If a fully ordained nun, knowingly, changes the dedication of a gain for an individual to another individual,

original: ji srid du rnyed pa rang gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du rnyed pa rang gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas so //
translated: then as long as she does not make that gain her own, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: rang gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: rang gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: If she makes it her own, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

original: dge slong mas dge 'dun sde gzhan du gnas la sde gcig la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa /
analyzed: dge slong mas dge 'dun sde gzhan du gnas la sde gcig la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa /
translated: If a fully ordained nun diverts to another faction of the saṅgha the offerings that have been dedicated to one faction of the saṅgha,

original: sde gnyis pa shos la sgyur bar byed na /
analyzed: sde gnyis pa shos la sgyur bar byed na /
translated: and if she does this in order to give them to a second faction of the saṅgha,

original: ji srid du rnyed pa rang gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du rnyed pa rang gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas so //
translated: then as long as she does not make the offerings her own, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: rang gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: rang gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: If she makes the offerings her own, she commits a serious offense.

original: de bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngos pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngos pa /
translated: Similarly, if she diverts to the saṅgha of nuns the offerings that have been dedicated to the saṅgha of monks,🔽then as long as she does not make the offerings her own, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la sgyur bar byed na yang snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la sgyur bar byed na yang snga ma bzhin no //
translated: If she makes the offerings her own, she commits a serious offense.

original: de bzhin du gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la bsngos pa /🔽dge 'dun sde gcig la sgyur bar byed na yang spang ba'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la bsngos pa / dge 'dun sde gcig la sgyur bar byed na yang spang ba'i ltung byed do //
translated: Similarly, if she diverts to one faction of the saṅgha the offerings that have been dedicated to both factions of the saṅgha,🔽then she commits a serious offense.🔽Similarly, if she diverts to both factions of the saṅgha the offerings that have been dedicated to one faction of the saṅgha, she commits a serious offense.🔽Similarly, if she diverts to the saṅgha of monks the offerings that have been dedicated to the stūpa,

original: de bzhin du dge 'dun sde gcig la bsngos pa gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la sgyur bar byed na yang spang ba'i ltung byed do //🔽de bzhin du mchod rten rnams kyi me tog gi gnas nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge 'dun sde gcig la bsngos pa gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la sgyur bar byed na yang spang ba'i ltung byed do //🔽de bzhin du mchod rten rnams kyi me tog gi gnas nas bzung ste /
translated: and if she does this in order to give them to the saṅgha of nuns,

original: bum pa'i bar me tog gi gnas dang / sgo khang la sogs pa @246a *//
analyzed: bum pa'i bar me tog gi gnas dang / sgo khang la sogs pa @246a *//
translated: and the space between the vases is the place for the flowers, and the porch, etc.

original: dang / de bzhin du rim gro'i khang par bsdos pa drod khang du sgyur bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du sro khang dang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / ka ba dang / gdung dang / sa la yang brjod par bya'o //🔽tha na mu lto ba gcig la bsdos pa /
analyzed: dang / de bzhin du rim gro'i khang par bsdos pa drod khang du sgyur bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du sro khang dang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / ka ba dang / gdung dang / sa la yang brjod par bya'o // tha na mu lto ba gcig la bsdos pa /
translated: and similarly, the place for the hot water is changed to the place for the sauna, and similarly, the place for the sauna is changed to the place for the assembly of monks, and the place for the assembly of monks is changed to the place for the pillars, beams, and ground.🔽If one changes the place for one beggar to the place for another beggar,

original: gnyis pa shos la sgyur bar byed na yang nyes byas so //
analyzed: gnyis pa shos la sgyur bar byed na yang nyes byas so //
translated: it is also an offense of wrong conduct.

original: gal te btsal ba las ma rnyed dam /
analyzed: gal te btsal ba las ma rnyed dam /
translated: If one does not find anything by searching,

original: gnang bar byin na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gnang bar byin na nyes pa med do //
translated: or if one is given permission, there is no offense.
